package.name: Asulpunto_Unicentaopos
package.summary: A basic integration for Magento with the popular Unicenta OPOS the open source, touch screen POS.
package.description:
Integrates Magento with uniCenta oPOS. http://www.unicentaopos.co.uk uniCenta oPOS is a free, commercial grade POS. It also supports touch screen terminals.
Features: -Products created on uniCenta oPOS are created automatically on Magento -Stock Diary updates on uniCenta oPOS are sent to Magento. -Purchases on uniCenta oPOS reduce stock from Magento. -Purchases on Magento subtract stock from uniCenta oPOS Stock Diary. -Syncronisation works via cron, synchronization of stock or products can now be triggered manually from the admin.
To use this extension you have to install uniCenta oPOS's database on a Mysql server accessible by the Magento server.
package.notes:
0.0.9 - Refactored Code - You can choose if attributes are always transfered or only on product creation - Moved Test Connection to database connection details - Renamed the configurations - Added Sycn Products button to enable you to test it is working without waiting for cron - Added Sycn Stock button to enable you to test it is working without waiting for cron - Fixed bug for Magento installations with a prefix
0.0.5 * Product set can be configured from Admin. This also solves a problem when Magento's default attribute set was deleted. * The warehouse that will track the stock can be selected from admin configuration. * Images on Unicenta are tranfered to Magento when the Magento Product does not have any images.
0.0.4 Advanced log to identify database connection issues
0.0.3 First official public release
